articles.title: India Inc's attrition woes deepen as job offers swell - The Economic Times
articles.description: Unlike previous years where candidates were offered 20-30% pay hike offers, letter of offers now include a 100% jump and with additional equity offered. Too many counter offers by employers will ruin the internal equity amongst employees, experts say.
